title: is it possible to transfer purchases to another account?
body:
either RP or BE?

this of course assumes both accounts are in the same region, aren't banned, and have never been punished whatsoever.

replies.body: Unfortunately, we can't trade content across accounts like this. We might be able to find other ways to help depending on why you needed content moved though!
just RP purchases mostly, for a fresh start. but I imagine its not possible. thanks though.
